snippet: It is second-and-goal from the 6, and there will be 1 minute 4 seconds left to play in the Super Bowl when the ball is snapped. You are coaching the team that is on offense and trailing. What do you do?
abstract: Current and former football coaches from across the spectrum offer their perspectives on late-game scenario the New York Giants faced en route to their Super Bowl victory over the New England Patriots.
lead_paragraph: It is second-and-goal from the 6, and there will be 1 minute 4 seconds left to play in the Super Bowl when the ball is snapped. You are coaching the team that is on offense and trailing. What do you do?

headline.seo: Super Bowl — Coaches Agree; It’s a Tough One
headline.main: Coaches Agree; It’s a Tough One
headline.print_headline: Coaches Agree; It’s a Tough One
